work.name: Compuletra
work.summary:
Worked over a software used to monitor the borders of Brazil, that use cameras to read the plates of vehicles crossing the borders.

The main technologies involved were C++, SQL Server, C# and the .NET Framework.

The software used multiple engines for character recognition, I started with a working proof of concept from a former employee, rewrote it from Delphi to C++, and optimized it for performance. And worked on several related applications in this ecosystem.
